#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int m,n;
        scanf("%d %d",&m, &n);
        int i,j;
        int mat[m+5][n+5];
        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
            for(j=0;j<n;j++)
                scanf("%d",&mat[i][j]);
        i=0,j=0;
        int a1 = -1,a2 = -1;
        int cnt =  0;
        while(true)
        {
            if(i != m-1 && mat[i+1][j] != 2147483647)
                a1 = mat[i+1][j];
            if(j != n-1 && mat[i][j+1] != 2147483647)
                a2 = mat[i][j+1];
            if(a1 == -1 && a2 == -1)
                break;
            else if(a1 != -1 && a2 != -1)
            {
                if(a1 < a2)
                    i++;
                else
                    j++;
                cnt++;
            }
            else if(a1 == -1)
            {
                j++;
                cnt++;
            }
            else
            {
                i++;
                cnt++;
            }
            a1 = -1;
            a2 = -1;
        }
        printf("%d\n",cnt);
    }
    return 0;
}
